name: male reproductive organ cancer
definition: A reproductive organ cancer that is manifested in the male genital system. This includes organs such as the penis and scrotum. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template\:Male_genital_neoplasia, url:http\://www.wrongdiagnosis.com/g/genital_system_cancer/intro.htm]

clinicalTrials.title: Investigating the Effects of Atezolizumab in People Whose Tumour DNA or RNA Indicates Possible Sensitivity (CAPTIV-8)
